divs: Sighting DetailsI had my dogs out in my back yard to go to the bathroom. Heard this strange noise in the sky, I looked up and seen 3 lights in a triangle shaped form the lights did not blink it was going in a straight line. I watched for a minute or two then yelled for my husband to come look. He came out and it was a little farther away but did see it. Then we seen another blinking light come toward it but nothing happened we think the blinking light was a plane but not sure what the triangle shaped thing I saw was. I do not believe in UFOS but I'm not sure what I saw. Then read online other people seen the same thing the same night I did.
